abstract: Large language models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable advancements, primarily due to their capabilities in modeling the hidden relationships within text sequences. This innovation presents a unique opportunity in the field of life sciences …

abstract: Scientific discovery contributes largely to the prosperity of human society, and recent progress shows that LLMs could potentially catalyst the process. However, it is still unclear whether LLMs can discover novel and valid hypotheses in chemistry. In this …
